segments.text: Oh , Henry , I haven't seen you for ages . Come in . Let me take your coat . How are you getting along ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please take a seat . Everything would be ready in a minute .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you bring me a glass of orange juice , please ? I am quite thirsty .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here you are . Here you go . We have cocktail and salad , fried chicken , French fries and icecream for dessert . Eating chicken while it's hot . it tastes better .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow , you're right . Everything is absolutely delicious . Please pass the pepper .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here you are . Taste the French fries .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here is to our friendship and health !
segments.speaker: S2
